description: In the current technical world, SaaS providers have plenty to help them out: from public clouds, to containers. From microservices architectures, to limitless scaling potential. But when you need to deploy multiple singe-tenant applications that use these, how do you manage to share resources while keeping sensitive data apart? This presentation is about how we did it at ironSource
